CustomField.description: Displays the full path of the block and Unit
CustomField.formula: If ( RecordType.Name = "Unit" , Parent_Block__r.Parent_Block__r.Name__c & " / " & Parent_Block__r.Name__c & " / " & Name__c, If ( RecordType.Name = "Block", Parent_Block__r.Name__c & " / " & Name__c, If ( RecordType.Name = "Site", Name__c, NULL)))
CustomField.label: Block/Unit
